name: Purr Pals: Purrfection
overview: Choose a cuddly virtual kitten to adopt, raise, groom and love! You'll have hours of fluffy fun choosing your kitty's breed, toys, and the accessories it will wear while you play. Features • Select your kitten from 40 different breeds.• Choose from 8 kitten toys.• 10 mini-games with achievements.• Unique kitten personalities.
